content.raw:
I think the error msg in the description is fine since levels and distributed simulation have not been enabled in the virtual\_stix world yet. 

Looking at the console msg, it's complaining that the ros-to-ign bridge is missing. You can install it by doing `sudo apt install ros1-ign-bridge`. I’ll update the installation tutorial
content.html:
I think the error msg in the description is fine since levels and distributed simulation have not been enabled in the virtual_stix world yet.

Looking at the console msg, it's complaining that the ros-to-ign bridge is missing. You can install it by doing sudo apt install ros1-ign-bridge. I’ll update the installation tutorial
